caption: The men walk into a restaurant and sit around a small table. The owner of the restaurant sees them and give one of them a hug. It seems like they have close relationship. Then the two men just sit there, eating and talking, until one of them see something. He asks the owner to give him a cup of water and pour it on his face, then he is pushed out of the restaurant. He walks to a taxi, but the driver doesn't allow him to get in. At the final part, he takes a phone and argues with the taxi driver.
